price: Ergasiis isaan kafaran qabeen jira. adabbiin kiyya akkam ta’e!
arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: thumma akhadhtu alladhīna kafarū fakayfa kāna nakīri
